faq.q: What makes Quantum Computers differnt from Classical Computers?
faq.a: Both Quantum and Classical Computers obey the laws of quantum mechanics but are different in a way that in a classical computer

faq.q: Do I need Quantum Mechanics I and/or II for this course?
faq.a: This course is like Blade Runner 2049. You will understand it weather or not you see the previous movie. But some context will definately give a deeper understanding. So we leave it as optional, Hail Ryan Gosling
